title: FS:  10 raw T205s (Lot no longer available)

posts.post_title: FS:  10 raw T205s (Lot no longer available)
posts.post_content:
UPDATE - lot no longer available.

These 10 T205s for sale as a lot at N/A shipped, payment via PayPal f/f.
"I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.

PM here or email to mpg1972 (at) gmail[dot]com

Will also take T205s in trade per my recently-updated want list at
    [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=227775[/url]

Almost all of these have at least some creasing or wrinkling.

Click thumbnail below the list for higher resolution images.

[quote]
Card                Back          Condition + Notes

Bell, George        Piedmont 25   Fair - miscut
Bransfield, Kitty   Piedmont 25   Good - possible trim
Doolan, Mickey      Sovereign 25  Fair
Ewing, Bob          Sovereign 25  Poor - spots of paper loss on back
Lobert, Hans        Piedmont 25   Good - miscut, possible trim

Needham, Tom        Sovereign 25  Fair
Oldring, Rube       Piedmont 25   Fair
Payne, Fred         Sovereign 25  Poor - back very faded/worn
Phillippe, Deacon   Honest 60     Good
Stanage, Oscar      Sovereign 25  Good, but trimmed
[/quote]
